section.title: SetDnsRecordsBulk Method - Atomia DNS API
section.para: Sets the records for all matching label/type/class-triples in a list of zones to that specified by the records passed.

section.title: Declaration syntax
section.programlisting: void SetDnsRecordsBulk( string[] zones, [resourcerecord|resourcerecord Datatype - Atomia DNS API][] records )

tr.td: an array containing the names of the zone
the resourcerecords to set for the zones
